summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fractal Platform deployment from GitHub. All backend APIs working correctly (100% success). Frontend pages load successfully with functional charts and navigation. WebSocket connectivity issues identified but don't impact core functionality.

integration_issues.issue: Frequent WebSocket connection failures and reconnection attempts

design_issues.issue: Minor error symbols (⊣) appearing in some components

passed_tests: DXY Fractal Terminal page loads and displays chart at /fractal/dxy
DXY Terminal API returns valid data: GET /api/fractal/dxy/terminal?focus=30d
Macro mode tab switch works on DXY page
DXY Macro Core score endpoint: GET /api/dxy-macro-core/score
Chart rendering and data visualization working
Navigation between different asset pages functional
Mode switching (Synthetic, Replay, Hybrid, Macro) working

success_percentage.frontend: 90% - All pages load, minor WebSocket issues

items: Investigate WebSocket connection stability - frequent reconnection attempts visible in console
Review error symbol display (⊣) appearing in some UI components
